verses.arabic: الٓمٓ
verses.english: Alif, Lam, Meem

verses.arabic: أَحَسِبَ ٱلنَّاسُ أَن يُتْرَكُوٓا۟ أَن يَقُولُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا وَهُمْ لَا يُفْتَنُونَ
verses.english: Do the people think that they will be left to say, "We believe" and they will not be tried?
verses.hausa: Ashe, mutãne sun yi zaton a bar su su ce: "Mun yi ĩmãni," alhãli kuwa bã zã a fitine su ba?"

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۖ فَلَيَعْلَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ صَدَقُوا۟ وَلَيَعْلَمَنَّ ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ
verses.english: But We have certainly tried those before them, and Allah will surely make evident those who are truthful, and He will surely make evident the liars.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle Mun fitini waɗanda ke a gabãninsu, dõmin lalle Allah Ya san waɗanda suka yi gaskiya, kuma lalle Ya san maƙaryata.

verses.arabic: أَمْ حَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَعْمَلُونَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ أَن يَسْبِقُونَا ۚ سَآءَ مَا يَحْكُمُونَ
verses.english: Or do those who do evil deeds think they can outrun Us? Evil is what they judge.
verses.hausa: Kõ waɗanda ke aikata miyãgun ayyuka sun yi zaton su tsẽre Mana? Abin da suke hukuntãwa ya mũnana.

verses.arabic: مَن كَانَ يَرْجُوا۟ لِقَآءَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ لَـَٔاتٍ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.english: Whoever should hope for the meeting with Allah - indeed, the term decreed by Allah is coming. And He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
verses.hausa: Wanda ya kasance yanã fãtan gamuwa da Al1ah to lalle ajalin Allah mai zuwa ne, kuma (Allah) Shĩ ne Mai ji, Masani.

verses.arabic: وَمَن جَـٰهَدَ فَإِنَّمَا يُجَـٰهِدُ لِنَفْسِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَنِىٌّ عَنِ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.english: And whoever strives only strives for [the benefit of] himself. Indeed, Allah is free from need of the worlds.
verses.hausa: Kuma wanda ya yi jihãdi, to, yanã yin jihãdin ne dõmin kansa. lalle Allah haƙĩƙa waɗatacce ne daga barin tãlikai.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَنُكَفِّرَنَّ عَنْهُمْ سَيِّـَٔاتِهِمْ وَلَنَجْزِيَنَّهُمْ أَحْسَنَ ٱلَّذِى كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: And those who believe and do righteous deeds - We will surely remove from them their misdeeds and will surely reward them according to the best of what they used to do.
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni, kuma suka aikata ayyukan ƙwarai, lalle Munã kankare musu miyãgun ayyukansu, kuma lalle Munã sãka musu da mafi kyaun abin da suka kasance sunã aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: وَوَصَّيْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ بِوَٰلِدَيْهِ حُسْنًا ۖ وَإِن جَـٰهَدَاكَ لِتُشْرِكَ بِى مَا لَيْسَ لَكَ بِهِۦ عِلْمٌ فَلَا تُطِعْهُمَآ ۚ إِلَىَّ مَرْجِعُكُمْ فَأُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: And We have enjoined upon man goodness to parents. But if they endeavor to make you associate with Me that of which you have no knowledge, do not obey them. To Me is your return, and I will inform you about what you used to do.
verses.hausa: Kuma Mun yi wa mutum wasiyyar kyautatãwa ga uwayensa, kuma idan sun tsananta maka dõmin ka yi shirki da Ni game da abin da bã ka da ilmi gare shi, to, kada ka yi musu ɗã'ã. Zuwa gare Ni makõmarku take sa'an nan In bã ku lãbari ga abin da kuka kasance kunã aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَنُدْخِلَنَّهُمْ فِى ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
verses.english: And those who believe and do righteous deeds - We will surely admit them among the righteous [into Paradise].
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni, kuma suka aikata ayyukan ƙwarai, lalle Munã shigar da su a cikin mutãnen kirki.

verses.arabic: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَقُولُ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ فَإِذَآ أُوذِىَ فِى ٱللَّهِ جَعَلَ فِتْنَةَ ٱلنَّاسِ كَعَذَابِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَئِن جَآءَ نَصْرٌ مِّن رَّبِّكَ لَيَقُولُنَّ إِنَّا كُنَّا مَعَكُمْ ۚ أَوَلَيْسَ ٱللَّهُ بِأَعْلَمَ بِمَا فِى صُدُورِ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.english: And of the people are some who say, "We believe in Allah," but when one [of them] is harmed for [the cause of] Allah, they consider the trial of the people as [if it were] the punishment of Allah. But if victory comes from your Lord, they say, "Indeed, We were with you." Is not Allah most knowing of what is within the breasts of all creatures?
verses.hausa: Kuma daga cikin mutãne akwai mai cẽwa, 'Mun yi ĩmãni da Allah" sa'an nan idan aka cũce shi wajen aikin Allah, sai ya sanya fitinar mutãne kamar azãbar Allah kuma lalle idan taimakon Ubangijinka ya zo, haƙĩƙa, ya kan ce: "Lalle mũ mun kasance tãre da ku." shin, Allah bai zama Mafi sani ba ga abin da ke a cikin ƙirãzan halittunSa?

verses.arabic: وَلَيَعْلَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَلَيَعْلَمَنَّ ٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ
verses.english: And Allah will surely make evident those who believe, and He will surely make evident the hypocrites.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle Allah na sanin waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni kuma lalle Yanã sanin munfukai.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ٱتَّبِعُوا۟ سَبِيلَنَا وَلْنَحْمِلْ خَطَـٰيَـٰكُمْ وَمَا هُم بِحَـٰمِلِينَ مِنْ خَطَـٰيَـٰهُم مِّن شَىْءٍ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ لَكَـٰذِبُونَ
verses.english: And those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Follow our way, and we will carry your sins." But they will not carry anything of their sins. Indeed, they are liars.
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suka kãfirta suka ce wa waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni, "Ku bi hanyarmu, kuma Mu ɗauki laifuffukanku," alhãli kõwa ba su zamo mãsu ɗauka da a kõme ba daga laifuffukansu. Lalle sũ maƙaryata ne.

verses.arabic: وَلَيَحْمِلُنَّ أَثْقَالَهُمْ وَأَثْقَالًا مَّعَ أَثْقَالِهِمْ ۖ وَلَيُسْـَٔلُنَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ عَمَّا كَانُوا۟ يَفْتَرُونَ
verses.english: But they will surely carry their [own] burdens and [other] burdens along with their burdens, and they will surely be questioned on the Day of Resurrection about what they used to invent.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle sunã ɗaukar kãyan nauyinsu da waɗansu nauyãyan kãya tãre da kãyan nauyinsu, kuma lalle zã a tambaye su a Rãnar ¡iyama game da abin da suka kasance sunã ƙirƙirãwa na ƙarya.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ فَلَبِثَ فِيهِمْ أَلْفَ سَنَةٍ إِلَّا خَمْسِينَ عَامًا فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلطُّوفَانُ وَهُمْ ظَـٰلِمُونَ
verses.english: And We certainly sent Noah to his people, and he remained among them a thousand years minus fifty years, and the flood seized them while they were wrongdoers.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle Mun aika Nũhu zuwa ga mutãnensa, sai ya zauna a cikinsu shẽkara dubu fãce shẽkara hamsin, sa'an nan cikowar (¦ũfãna) ta kãmã su, alhãli kuwa sũ ne mãsu zãlunci.

verses.arabic: فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُ وَأَصْحَـٰبَ ٱلسَّفِينَةِ وَجَعَلْنَـٰهَآ ءَايَةً لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.english: But We saved him and the companions of the ship, and We made it a sign for the worlds.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan Muka tsĩrar da shi da mutãnen jirgin, kuma Muka sanya jirgin ya zama wata ãyã ga tãlikai.

verses.arabic: وَإِبْرَٰهِيمَ إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ ۖ ذَٰلِكُمْ خَيْرٌ لَّكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: And [We sent] Abraham, when he said to his people, "Worship Allah and fear Him. That is best for you, if you should know.
verses.hausa: Da Ibrãhĩm a lõkacin da ya ce wa mutãnensa, "Ku bautã wa Allah ku bĩ Shi da taƙawa. Wannan Shĩ ne alhẽri a gare ku idan kun kasance kunã sani.

verses.arabic: إِنَّمَا تَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوْثَـٰنًا وَتَخْلُقُونَ إِفْكًا ۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ تَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ لَكُمْ رِزْقًا فَٱبْتَغُوا۟ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرِّزْقَ وَٱعْبُدُوهُ وَٱشْكُرُوا۟ لَهُۥٓ ۖ إِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.english: You only worship, besides Allah, idols, and you produce a falsehood. Indeed, those you worship besides Allah do not possess for you [the power of] provision. So seek from Allah provision and worship Him and be grateful to Him. To Him you will be returned."
verses.hausa: "Abin da dai kuke bautãwa, baiein Allah, gumaka ne, kuma kun ƙirƙira ƙarya. Lalle waɗannan da kuke bauta wa baicin Allah, bã su mallakã muku arziki. Sabõda haka ku nẽmi arziki a wurin Allah kawai, kuma ku bauta Masa, kuma ku yi gõdiya zuwa gare Shi. Zuwa gare Shi ake mayar da ku.

verses.arabic: وَإِن تُكَذِّبُوا۟ فَقَدْ كَذَّبَ أُمَمٌ مِّن قَبْلِكُمْ ۖ وَمَا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
verses.english: And if you [people] deny [the message] - already nations before you have denied. And there is not upon the Messenger except [the duty of] clear notification.
verses.hausa: "Kuma idan kun ƙaryata, to, lalle waɗansu al'ummõmi a gabãninku sun ƙaryata, kuma bãbu abin da ke kan Manzo, fãce iyar da manzanci, iyarwa bayyananna."

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ كَيْفَ يُبْدِئُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْخَلْقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥٓ ۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٌ
verses.english: Have they not considered how Allah begins creation and then repeats it? Indeed that, for Allah, is easy.
verses.hausa: Shin, ba su ga yadda Allah ke fãra yin halitta ba, sa'an nan kuma Ya mayar da ita? Lalle wannan abu ne mai sauƙi ga Allah.

verses.arabic: قُلْ سِيرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱنظُرُوا۟ كَيْفَ بَدَأَ ٱلْخَلْقَ ۚ ثُمَّ ٱللَّهُ يُنشِئُ ٱلنَّشْأَةَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةَ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
verses.english: Say, [O Muhammad], "Travel through the land and observe how He began creation. Then Allah will produce the final creation. Indeed Allah, over all things, is competent."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Ku yi tafiya cikin ƙasa, sa'an nan ku dũba yadda (Allah) Ya fãra yin halitta, sa'an nan kuma Allah Yanã ƙãga wata halittar mayarwa. Lalle Allah Mai ikon yi ne a kan kõme.

verses.arabic: يُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرْحَمُ مَن يَشَآءُ ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ تُقْلَبُونَ
verses.english: He punishes whom He wills and has mercy upon whom He wills, and to Him you will be returned.
verses.hausa: "Yanã azabta wanda Ya so, kuma Yanã jin ƙan wanda Ya so. Kuma zuwa gare shi ake jũyaku."

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعْجِزِينَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ ۖ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِىٍّ وَلَا نَصِيرٍ
verses.english: And you will not cause failure [to Allah] upon the earth or in the heaven. And you have not other than Allah any protector or any helper.
verses.hausa: "Kuma ba ku zamo mãsu buwãya ba a cikin ƙasã, kuma haka a cikin sama kuma bã ku da wani majiɓinci wanda ba Allah ba, kuma ha ku da wani mataimaki."

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَلِقَآئِهِۦٓ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يَئِسُوا۟ مِن رَّحْمَتِى وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
verses.english: And the ones who disbelieve in the signs of Allah and the meeting with Him - those have despaired of My mercy, and they will have a painful punishment.
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suka kãfirta da ãyõyin Allah da gamuwa da shi, waɗannan sun yanke ƙauna daga rahamaTa kuma waɗannan sunã da wata azãba mai raɗaɗi.

verses.arabic: فَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوْمِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوا۟ ٱقْتُلُوهُ أَوْ حَرِّقُوهُ فَأَنجَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.english: And the answer of Abraham's people was not but that they said, "Kill him or burn him," but Allah saved him from the fire. Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan bãbu abin da ya kasance jawãbin mutãnensa (Ibrãhĩm) fãce dai suka ce: "Ku kashe shi kõ, ku ƙõnã shi," Sai Allah Ya tsĩrar da shi daga wutã. Lallea cikin wannan akwai ayõyi ga mutãnen da ke yin ĩmãni.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ إِنَّمَا ٱتَّخَذْتُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوْثَـٰنًا مَّوَدَّةَ بَيْنِكُمْ فِى ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ ثُمَّ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ يَكْفُرُ بَعْضُكُم بِبَعْضٍ وَيَلْعَنُ بَعْضُكُم بَعْضًا وَمَأْوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن نَّـٰصِرِينَ
verses.english: And [Abraham] said, "You have only taken, other than Allah, idols as [a bond of] affection among you in worldly life. Then on the Day of Resurrection you will deny one another and curse one another, and your refuge will be the Fire, and you will not have any helpers."
verses.hausa: Kuma Ibrahĩm ya ce "Bãbu abin da kuka yi sai dai kub bar Allah kun riƙi gumãka sabõda sõyayyar tsakãninku a cikin rãyuwar dũniya, a'an nan a Rãnar ¡iyãma sãshinku zai kãfirce wa sãshi, kuma makõmarku ita ce wutã kuma bã ku da waɗansu mataimaka."

verses.arabic: فَـَٔامَنَ لَهُۥ لُوطٌ ۘ وَقَالَ إِنِّى مُهَاجِرٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّىٓ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
verses.english: And Lot believed him. [Abraham] said, "Indeed, I will emigrate to [the service of] my Lord. Indeed, He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise."
verses.hausa: Sai Lũɗu ya yi ĩmãni da shi. Kuma Ibrãhĩm ya ce: "Lallenĩ mai ƙaura ne zuwa ga Ubangijina. Lalle Shĩ Shĩ ne Mabuwãyi, Mai hikima."

verses.arabic: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ وَجَعَلْنَا فِى ذُرِّيَّتِهِ ٱلنُّبُوَّةَ وَٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ أَجْرَهُۥ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ لَمِنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
verses.english: And We gave to Him Isaac and Jacob and placed in his descendants prophethood and scripture. And We gave him his reward in this world, and indeed, he is in the Hereafter among the righteous.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka bã shi Ishãƙa da Ya'aƙũba, kuma Muka sanya Annabci da littãfi a cikin zuriyarsa. Kuma Mun bã shi sakamakonsa a dũniya, kuma lalle shĩ a Lãhira, tabbas, yanã a cikin sãlihai.

verses.arabic: وَلُوطًا إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِۦٓ إِنَّكُمْ لَتَأْتُونَ ٱلْفَـٰحِشَةَ مَا سَبَقَكُم بِهَا مِنْ أَحَدٍ مِّنَ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.english: And [mention] Lot, when he said to his people, "Indeed, you commit such immorality as no one has preceded you with from among the worlds.
verses.hausa: Da Lũɗu, a lõkacin daya ce wa mutãnensa, "Lalle kũ, haƙĩƙa kunã jẽ wa alfãsha wadda wani mahalũƙi daga cikin dũniya bai riga ku gare ta ba.

verses.arabic: أَئِنَّكُمْ لَتَأْتُونَ ٱلرِّجَالَ وَتَقْطَعُونَ ٱلسَّبِيلَ وَتَأْتُونَ فِى نَادِيكُمُ ٱلْمُنكَرَ ۖ فَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوْمِهِۦٓ إِلَّآ أَن قَالُوا۟ ٱئْتِنَا بِعَذَابِ ٱللَّهِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.english: Indeed, you approach men and obstruct the road and commit in your meetings [every] evil." And the answer of his people was not but they said, "Bring us the punishment of Allah, if you should be of the truthful."
verses.hausa: "Ashe, lalle kũ kunã je wa maza, kuma ku yi fashin hanya kuma ku je, a cikin majalisarku da abin da bã shi da kyau? To, jawãbin mutãnensa bai kasance ba fãce dai sun ce: 'Ka zo mana da azãbar Allah, idan ka kasance daga mãsu gaskiya.'"

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱنصُرْنِى عَلَى ٱلْقَوْمِ ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ
verses.english: He said, "My Lord, support me against the corrupting people."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ya Ubangijĩna! Ka taimake ni a kan mutãnen nan maɓarnata."

verses.arabic: وَلَمَّا جَآءَتْ رُسُلُنَآ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ بِٱلْبُشْرَىٰ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا مُهْلِكُوٓا۟ أَهْلِ هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْقَرْيَةِ ۖ إِنَّ أَهْلَهَا كَانُوا۟ ظَـٰلِمِينَ
verses.english: And when Our messengers came to Abraham with the good tidings, they said, "Indeed, we will destroy the people of that Lot's city. Indeed, its people have been wrongdoers."
verses.hausa: Kuma a lõkacin da ManzanninMu suka jẽ wa Ibrãhĩm da bushãra suka ce: "Lalle mu mãsu halaka mutãnen, wannan alƙarya ne. Lalle mutãnenta sun kasance mãsu zãlunci."

verses.arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ فِيهَا لُوطًا ۚ قَالُوا۟ نَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن فِيهَا ۖ لَنُنَجِّيَنَّهُۥ وَأَهْلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمْرَأَتَهُۥ كَانَتْ مِنَ ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ
verses.english: [Abraham] said, "Indeed, within it is Lot." They said, "We are more knowing of who is within it. We will surely save him and his family, except his wife. She is to be of those who remain behind."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Lalle akwai Lũɗu a cikinta!" Suka ce: "Mũ ne mafiya sani ga waɗanda suke a cikinta, lalle munã tsĩrar da shi da mutãnensa, fãce fa mãtarsa ta kasance a cikin mãsu wanzuwa."

verses.arabic: وَلَمَّآ أَن جَآءَتْ رُسُلُنَا لُوطًا سِىٓءَ بِهِمْ وَضَاقَ بِهِمْ ذَرْعًا وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ وَلَا تَحْزَنْ ۖ إِنَّا مُنَجُّوكَ وَأَهْلَكَ إِلَّا ٱمْرَأَتَكَ كَانَتْ مِنَ ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ
verses.english: And when Our messengers came to Lot, he was distressed for them and felt for them great discomfort. They said, "Fear not, nor grieve. Indeed, we will save you and your family, except your wife; she is to be of those who remain behind.
verses.hausa: Kuma a lõkacin da ManzanninMu suka je wa Lũɗu ya ɓãta rai sabõda su, kuma yã ƙuntata ga kirji sabõda su. Kuma suka ce: "Kada ka ji tsõro kuma kada ka yi baƙin ciki lalle mũ mãsu tsĩrar da kai ne da iyãlanka, fãce dai matarka ta kasance daga mãsu wanzuwa.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا مُنزِلُونَ عَلَىٰٓ أَهْلِ هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْقَرْيَةِ رِجْزًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْسُقُونَ
verses.english: Indeed, we will bring down on the people of this city punishment from the sky because they have been defiantly disobedient."
verses.hausa: "Lalle mũ, mãsu saukar da azãba ne daga sama a kan mutãnen wannan alƙarya sabõda abin da suka kasance sunã yi na fãsiƙanci."

verses.arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكْنَا مِنْهَآ ءَايَةًۢ بَيِّنَةً لِّقَوْمٍ يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.english: And We have certainly left of it a sign as clear evidence for a people who use reason.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle Mun bar wata ãyã bayyananna daga gare ta ga mutãne mãsu hankalta.

verses.arabic: وَإِلَىٰ مَدْيَنَ أَخَاهُمْ شُعَيْبًا فَقَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱرْجُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَ وَلَا تَعْثَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ مُفْسِدِينَ
verses.english: And to Madyan [We sent] their brother Shu'ayb, and he said, "O my people, worship Allah and expect the Last Day and do not commit abuse on the earth, spreading corruption."
verses.hausa: Kuma zuwa ga Madyana, Mun aika ɗan'uwansu shu'aibu, sai ya ce: "Ya mutãnena! Ku bauta wa Allah kuma ku yi fatan (rahamar) Rãnar Lãhira, kuma kada ku yi ɓarna a cikin ƙasã, alhãli kuwa kunã mãsu lãlãtarwa."

verses.arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلرَّجْفَةُ فَأَصْبَحُوا۟ فِى دَارِهِمْ جَـٰثِمِينَ
verses.english: But they denied him, so the earthquake seized them, and they became within their home [corpses] fallen prone.
verses.hausa: Sai suka ƙaryata shi, sabõda haka tsãwa ta kãmã su, dõmin haka suka wãyi gari sunã guggurfãne.

verses.arabic: وَعَادًا وَثَمُودَا۟ وَقَد تَّبَيَّنَ لَكُم مِّن مَّسَـٰكِنِهِمْ ۖ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ فَصَدَّهُمْ عَنِ ٱلسَّبِيلِ وَكَانُوا۟ مُسْتَبْصِرِينَ
verses.english: And [We destroyed] 'Aad and Thamud, and it has become clear to you from their [ruined] dwellings. And Satan had made pleasing to them their deeds and averted them from the path, and they were endowed with perception.
verses.hausa: Da Ãdawa da Samũdãwa alhãli kuwa lalle alãmun azãba sun bayyana a gare su daga gidãjensu kuma Shaiɗan ya ƙawãta musu ayyukansu, sabõda haka ya kange su daga hanyar Allah, kuma sun kasance mãsu basĩra!

verses.arabic: وَقَـٰرُونَ وَفِرْعَوْنَ وَهَـٰمَـٰنَ ۖ وَلَقَدْ جَآءَهُم مُّوسَىٰ بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ فَٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ سَـٰبِقِينَ
verses.english: And [We destroyed] Qarun and Pharaoh and Haman. And Moses had already come to them with clear evidences, and they were arrogant in the land, but they were not outrunners [of Our punishment].
verses.hausa: Kuma ¡ãrũna da Fir'auna da Hãmãna, kuma lalle Mũsaya je musu da hujjõji, sai suka yi girman kai a cikin ƙasã kuma ba su kasance mãsu tsẽrẽwa ba.

verses.arabic: فَكُلًّا أَخَذْنَا بِذَنۢبِهِۦ ۖ فَمِنْهُم مَّنْ أَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِ حَاصِبًا وَمِنْهُم مَّنْ أَخَذَتْهُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ وَمِنْهُم مَّنْ خَسَفْنَا بِهِ ٱلْأَرْضَ وَمِنْهُم مَّنْ أَغْرَقْنَا ۚ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيَظْلِمَهُمْ وَلَـٰكِن كَانُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ يَظْلِمُونَ
verses.english: So each We seized for his sin; and among them were those upon whom We sent a storm of stones, and among them were those who were seized by the blast [from the sky], and among them were those whom We caused the earth to swallow, and among them were those whom We drowned. And Allah would not have wronged them, but it was they who were wronging themselves.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka kõwanensu Mun kama shi da laifinsa. Watau daga cikinsu akwai wanda Muka aika iskar tsakuwa a kansa kuma daga cikinsu akwai wanda tsãwa ta kãmã, kuma daga cikinsu akwai wanda Muka birkice ƙasã da shi kuma daga cikinsu akwai wanda Muka nutsar. Bã ya yiwuwa ga Allah Ya zãlunce su, amma sun kasance kansu suke zãlunta.

verses.arabic: مَثَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَوْلِيَآءَ كَمَثَلِ ٱلْعَنكَبُوتِ ٱتَّخَذَتْ بَيْتًا ۖ وَإِنَّ أَوْهَنَ ٱلْبُيُوتِ لَبَيْتُ ٱلْعَنكَبُوتِ ۖ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: The example of those who take allies other than Allah is like that of the spider who takes a home. And indeed, the weakest of homes is the home of the spider, if they only knew.
verses.hausa: Misãlin waɗanda suka riƙi waɗansu masõya waɗanda bã Allah ba, kamar misãlin gizõgizo ne wanda ya riƙi wani ɗan gida, alhãli kuwa lalle mafi raunin gidãje, shĩ ne gidan gizogizo, dã sun kasance sunã sane.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مِن شَىْءٍ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
verses.english: Indeed, Allah knows whatever thing they call upon other than Him. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
verses.hausa: Lalle Allah Yanã sane da abin da suke kira wanda bã Shi ba na wani abu duka kuma shĩ ne Mabuwãyi, Mai hikima.

verses.arabic: وَتِلْكَ ٱلْأَمْثَـٰلُ نَضْرِبُهَا لِلنَّاسِ ۖ وَمَا يَعْقِلُهَآ إِلَّا ٱلْعَـٰلِمُونَ
verses.english: And these examples We present to the people, but none will understand them except those of knowledge.
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗancan misãlan Munã bayyana su ga mutãne kuma bãbu mai hankalta da su sai mãsu ilmi.

verses.arabic: خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ بِٱلْحَقِّ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: Allah created the heavens and the earth in truth. Indeed in that is a sign for the believers.
verses.hausa: Allah Ya halitta sammai da ƙasa da gaskiya. Lalle cikin wancan akwai ãyã ga mũminai.

verses.arabic: ٱتْلُ مَآ أُوحِىَ إِلَيْكَ مِنَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَأَقِمِ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ تَنْهَىٰ عَنِ ٱلْفَحْشَآءِ وَٱلْمُنكَرِ ۗ وَلَذِكْرُ ٱللَّهِ أَكْبَرُ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ مَا تَصْنَعُونَ
verses.english: Recite, [O Muhammad], what has been revealed to you of the Book and establish prayer. Indeed, prayer prohibits immorality and wrongdoing, and the remembrance of Allah is greater. And Allah knows that which you do.
verses.hausa: Ka karanta abin da ake yin wahayi zuwa gare ka daga Littãfi, kuma ka tsayar da salla. Lalle salla tanã hanãwa daga alfãsha da abni ƙyãma, kuma lalle ambaton Allah ya fi girma, kuma Allah Yanã sane da abin da kuke aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تُجَـٰدِلُوٓا۟ أَهْلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ إِلَّا بِٱلَّتِى هِىَ أَحْسَنُ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَقُولُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا بِٱلَّذِىٓ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْنَا وَأُنزِلَ إِلَيْكُمْ وَإِلَـٰهُنَا وَإِلَـٰهُكُمْ وَٰحِدٌ وَنَحْنُ لَهُۥ مُسْلِمُونَ
verses.english: And do not argue with the People of the Scripture except in a way that is best, except for those who commit injustice among them, and say, "We believe in that which has been revealed to us and revealed to you. And our God and your God is one; and we are Muslims [in submission] to Him."
verses.hausa: Kada ku yi jayayya da mazowa Littãfi sai fa da magana wadda ta fi kyau, sai fa waɗanda suka yi zãlunci daga gare su, kuma ku ce, "Mun yi ĩmãni da abin da aka saukar a gare mu kuma aka saukar a gare ku, kuma Abin bautãwarmu da Abin bautãwarku Guda ne, kama mũ mãsu sallamãwa ne a gare shi."

verses.arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلْنَآ إِلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ ۚ فَٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ ۖ وَمِنْ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَن يُؤْمِنُ بِهِۦ ۚ وَمَا يَجْحَدُ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ إِلَّا ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.english: And thus We have sent down to you the Qur'an. And those to whom We [previously] gave the Scripture believe in it. And among these [people of Makkah] are those who believe in it. And none reject Our verses except the disbelievers.
verses.hausa: Kuma kamar haka Muka saukar da Littafi a gare ka, to, waɗannan da Muka bai wa Littãfi sanã ĩmãni da shi, daga cikin wãɗannan akwai mai ĩmãni da shi, kuma bãbu mai musun ãyõyinMu, fãce kãfirai.

verses.arabic: وَمَا كُنتَ تَتْلُوا۟ مِن قَبْلِهِۦ مِن كِتَـٰبٍ وَلَا تَخُطُّهُۥ بِيَمِينِكَ ۖ إِذًا لَّٱرْتَابَ ٱلْمُبْطِلُونَ
verses.english: And you did not recite before it any scripture, nor did you inscribe one with your right hand. Otherwise the falsifiers would have had [cause for] doubt.
verses.hausa: Kuma ba ka kasance kana karãtun wani littãfi ba a gabãninsa, kuma bã ka rubũtunsa da dãmanka dã haka yã auku, dã mãsu ɓarnã sun yi shakka.

verses.arabic: بَلْ هُوَ ءَايَـٰتٌۢ بَيِّنَـٰتٌ فِى صُدُورِ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْعِلْمَ ۚ وَمَا يَجْحَدُ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَآ إِلَّا ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ
verses.english: Rather, the Qur'an is distinct verses [preserved] within the breasts of those who have been given knowledge. And none reject Our verses except the wrongdoers.
verses.hausa: Ã'a, shĩ ãyõyi ne bayyanannu a cikin ƙirãzan waɗanda aka bai wa ilmi. Kuma bãbu mai musun ãyõyinMu fãce azzãlumai.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ لَوْلَآ أُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ ءَايَـٰتٌ مِّن رَّبِّهِۦ ۖ قُلْ إِنَّمَا ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ وَإِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.english: But they say, "Why are not signs sent down to him from his Lord?" Say, "The signs are only with Allah, and I am only a clear warner."
verses.hausa: Kuma suka ce: "Don me ba a saukar masa da ãyõi ba daga Ubangijinsa? "Ka ce: "Su ãyõyi a wurin Allah kawai suke, kuma lalle ni mai gargaɗi kawai ne, mai bayyanãwa."

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَكْفِهِمْ أَنَّآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ يُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَرَحْمَةً وَذِكْرَىٰ لِقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.english: And is it not sufficient for them that We revealed to you the Book which is recited to them? Indeed in that is a mercy and reminder for a people who believe.
verses.hausa: Shin bai ishe su ba cẽwa lalle Mũ, Mun saukar da Littãfin akanka, anã karanta shi a kansu? Lalle a cikin wancan haƙĩƙa akwai rahama da tunãtawa ga mutanen da ke yin ĩmãni.

verses.arabic: قُلْ كَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ بَيْنِى وَبَيْنَكُمْ شَهِيدًا ۖ يَعْلَمُ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ بِٱلْبَـٰطِلِ وَكَفَرُوا۟ بِٱللَّهِ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْخَـٰسِرُونَ
verses.english: Say, "Sufficient is Allah between me and you as Witness. He knows what is in the heavens and earth. And they who have believed in falsehood and disbelieved in Allah - it is those who are the losers."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Allah Yã isa shaida a tsakãnĩna da tsakãnĩnku Yanã sane da abin da ke a cikin sammai da ƙasã, kuma waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni da ɗarya kuma suka kãfirta da Allah, waɗannan sũ nemãsu hasãra."

verses.arabic: وَيَسْتَعْجِلُونَكَ بِٱلْعَذَابِ ۚ وَلَوْلَآ أَجَلٌ مُّسَمًّى لَّجَآءَهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ وَلَيَأْتِيَنَّهُم بَغْتَةً وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.english: And they urge you to hasten the punishment. And if not for [the decree of] a specified term, punishment would have reached them. But it will surely come to them suddenly while they perceive not.
verses.hausa: Kuma suna nẽman ka da gaggauta azãba, to, bã dõmin ajali ƙayyadadde ba, dã azãba ta jẽ musu kuma lalle dã tanã iske su bisa ia abke, alhãli kuwa sũ ba su sani ba.

verses.arabic: يَسْتَعْجِلُونَكَ بِٱلْعَذَابِ وَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمُحِيطَةٌۢ بِٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.english: They urge you to hasten the punishment. And indeed, Hell will be encompassing of the disbelievers
verses.hausa: Sunã nẽman ka da gaggauta azãba, kuma lalle Jahannama, tabbas, mai kẽwayewa ce gakãfirai.

verses.arabic: يَوْمَ يَغْشَىٰهُمُ ٱلْعَذَابُ مِن فَوْقِهِمْ وَمِن تَحْتِ أَرْجُلِهِمْ وَيَقُولُ ذُوقُوا۟ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: On the Day the punishment will cover them from above them and from below their feet and it is said, "Taste [the result of] what you used to do."
verses.hausa: Rãnar da azãba ke rufe su daga samansu da kuma ƙasan ƙafafunsu kuma Ya ce: "Ku ɗanɗani abin da kuka kasance kunã aikatãwa."

verses.arabic: يَـٰعِبَادِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِنَّ أَرْضِى وَٰسِعَةٌ فَإِيَّـٰىَ فَٱعْبُدُونِ
verses.english: O My servants who have believed, indeed My earth is spacious, so worship only Me.
verses.hausa: Yã bãyiNa, waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni! Lalle fa ƙasãTa mai yalwã ce, sabãda haka ku bauta Mini.

verses.arabic: كُلُّ نَفْسٍ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلْمَوْتِ ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيْنَا تُرْجَعُونَ
verses.english: Every soul will taste death. Then to Us will you be returned.
verses.hausa: Kõwane rai mai ɗanɗanar mutuwa ne, sa'an nan zuwa gare Mu ake mayar da ku.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَنُبَوِّئَنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلْجَنَّةِ غُرَفًا تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ نِعْمَ أَجْرُ ٱلْعَـٰمِلِينَ
verses.english: And those who have believed and done righteous deeds - We will surely assign to them of Paradise [elevated] chambers beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. Excellent is the reward of the [righteous] workers
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni kuma suka aikata ayyukan ƙwarai, lalle zã Mu zaunar da su daga cikin Aljanna a gidãjen bẽne, ƙoramu nã gudãna daga ƙarƙashinsu, sunã madawwama a cikinsu. To, madalla da sakamakon mãsu aikin ƙwarai.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُوا۟ وَعَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَتَوَكَّلُونَ
verses.english: Who have been patient and upon their Lord rely.
verses.hausa: Waɗanda suka yi haƙuri, kuma sunã dõgara ga Ubangijinsu kawai.

verses.arabic: وَكَأَيِّن مِّن دَآبَّةٍ لَّا تَحْمِلُ رِزْقَهَا ٱللَّهُ يَرْزُقُهَا وَإِيَّاكُمْ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.english: And how many a creature carries not its [own] provision. Allah provides for it and for you. And He is the Hearing, the Knowing.
verses.hausa: Kuma da yawa dabba wadda bã ta ɗaukar abincinta Allah Yanã ciyar da ita tãre da ku, kuma Shĩ ne Mai ji, Mai ilmi.

verses.arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُم مَّنْ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمْسَ وَٱلْقَمَرَ لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ يُؤْفَكُونَ
verses.english: If you asked them, "Who created the heavens and earth and subjected the sun and the moon?" they would surely say, "Allah." Then how are they deluded?
verses.hausa: Lalle idan ka tambaye su: "Wãne ne ya halitta sammai da ƙasã kuma ya hõre rãnã da watã?" Lalle sunã cẽwa Allah ne. TO, yãya ake karkatar da su?

verses.arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَبْسُطُ ٱلرِّزْقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَقْدِرُ لَهُۥٓ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌ
verses.english: Allah extends provision for whom He wills of His servants and restricts for him. Indeed Allah is, of all things, Knowing.
verses.hausa: A1lah ne ke shimfiɗa arziki ga wanda Yake so daga cikin bãyinsa kuma Yanã ƙuntãtãwa ga (wanda, Yake so). Lalle Allah, Masani ne ga dukan kõme.

verses.arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلْتَهُم مَّن نَّزَّلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَأَحْيَا بِهِ ٱلْأَرْضَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَوْتِهَا لَيَقُولُنَّ ٱللَّهُ ۚ قُلِ ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ۚ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْقِلُونَ
verses.english: And if you asked them, "Who sends down rain from the sky and gives life thereby to the earth after its lifelessness?" they would surely say " Allah." Say, "Praise to Allah "; but most of them do not reason.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle idan ka tambaye su. "Wãne ne ya saukar da ruwa daga sama, har ya rãyar da ƙasã game da shi a bãyan mutuwarta?" Lalle sunã cẽwa, "Allah ne." Ka ce: "Gõdiya tã tabbata ga Allah." Ã'a, mafi yawansu bã su hankalta.

verses.arabic: وَمَا هَـٰذِهِ ٱلْحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنْيَآ إِلَّا لَهْوٌ وَلَعِبٌ ۚ وَإِنَّ ٱلدَّارَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةَ لَهِىَ ٱلْحَيَوَانُ ۚ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: And this worldly life is not but diversion and amusement. And indeed, the home of the Hereafter - that is the [eternal] life, if only they knew.
verses.hausa: Kuma wannan rãyuwa ta dũniya ba ta zamo ba, fãce abar shagala da wãsã kuma lalle Lãhira tabbas, ita ce rãyuwa, dã sun kasance sunã sani.

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا رَكِبُوا۟ فِى ٱلْفُلْكِ دَعَوُا۟ ٱللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ فَلَمَّا نَجَّىٰهُمْ إِلَى ٱلْبَرِّ إِذَا هُمْ يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.english: And when they board a ship, they supplicate Allah, sincere to Him in religion. But when He delivers them to the land, at once they associate others with Him
verses.hausa: To, a lõkacin da suka shiga cikin jirgin ruwa, sun kirãyi Allah sunã mãsu tsarkake addini a gare shi, to, a lõkacin da Ya tsĩrar da su zuwa ga tudun ƙasã, sai gã su sunã shirki.

verses.arabic: لِيَكْفُرُوا۟ بِمَآ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمْ وَلِيَتَمَتَّعُوا۟ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: So that they will deny what We have granted them, and they will enjoy themselves. But they are going to know.
verses.hausa: Dõmin su kãfirce wa abin da Muka bã su kuma dõmin su ji dãɗi sa'an nan kuma zã su sani.

verses.arabic: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا جَعَلْنَا حَرَمًا ءَامِنًا وَيُتَخَطَّفُ ٱلنَّاسُ مِنْ حَوْلِهِمْ ۚ أَفَبِٱلْبَـٰطِلِ يُؤْمِنُونَ وَبِنِعْمَةِ ٱللَّهِ يَكْفُرُونَ
verses.english: Have they not seen that We made [Makkah] a safe sanctuary, while people are being taken away all around them? Then in falsehood do they believe, and in the favor of Allah they disbelieve?
verses.hausa: Shin, ba su ga cẽwa, lalle Mun sanya Hurumi amintacce ba alhãli kuwa anã fisge mutãne a gẽfensu? Shin, da ɓãtaccen abu suke ĩmãni kuma da ni'imarAllah suka kãfirta?

verses.arabic: وَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوْ كَذَّبَ بِٱلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُۥٓ ۚ أَلَيْسَ فِى جَهَنَّمَ مَثْوًى لِّلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.english: And who is more unjust than one who invents a lie about Allah or denies the truth when it has come to him? Is there not in Hell a [sufficient] residence for the disbelievers?
verses.hausa: Kuma wãne ne ya fi zãlunci bisa ga wanda ya ƙirƙira ƙarya ya jingina ta ga Allah, kõ kuma ya ƙaryata gaskiya a lõkacin da ta je masa? Ashe a cikin Jahannama bãbu mazauna ga kãfirai?

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ جَـٰهَدُوا۟ فِينَا لَنَهْدِيَنَّهُمْ سُبُلَنَا ۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَمَعَ ٱلْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.english: And those who strive for Us - We will surely guide them to Our ways. And indeed, Allah is with the doers of good.
verses.hausa: Kuma wadannan da suka yi ƙõƙari ga nẽman yardarMu, lalle Munã shiryar da su ga hanyõyinMu, kuma lalle Allah, tabbas, Yanã tãre da mãsu kyautatãwa (ga addĩninsu).
